data.persona: I am a noble from the West. I am well educated and versed in politics. I command attend and punish insubordination harshly.
data.description:
You are in the chamber entrance.
The entrance to the chamber is very ornate. It is filled with many religious symbols. There are candles and prayer books on  a table right next to the door. It is a wooden door. There is a sign near the front, which lists the name of people within the church. They can smell the scent of candles burning.
The people is here.

You are carrying a whip.

data.short_motivation: I want to scare the church attendees into obeying the law.
data.mid_motivation: I want everyone in town to hear about my punishment.
data.long_motivation: I want everyone in town to be scared into obeying the law.
